Question.Subject: where is the line "i like it when the red water comes out" from!!!!!?
Question.Content: first person to get it wins!!! DONT USE THE INTERNET AND BE LAME
Question.ChosenAnswer:
SALAD FINGERS MY FRIEND!!!
episode 2 i believe. he sees a shiny hook in the wall, then pokes his finger right through it. as blood drips down his salad fingers, he disturbingly says "i like it when the red water comes out..." then he passes out.

Answer.Reference: big fan of salad fingers xD
